scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache network/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache network/mainnet.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:ropsten: mustache network/ropsten.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache network/ropsten.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:polygon: mustache network/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache network/matic.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/constants.ts
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: mustache network/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache network/rinkeby.json src/mappings/constants.template.ts > src/mappings/constants.ts
